name: Backup OpenShift Master Nodes
extra_vars:
---
#Temporary location where the tar file will be created.  This file will be removed.
dest_backup_dir: /tmp/
#Location (on the Ansible host) where the tar will be copied.
#This parameter should be updated to use a location that's backed up on the host.
host_dest_dir: /opt/backups/ocpsite2/
# Clean Up old tar files on after failed backup
cleanup_temp_folder: false

name: Build and Tag Image Steam at datacenter
extra_vars:
---
hostname: master1.example.com
current_build: cart:latest
build_target: cart:v6
project_name: coolstore
build_name: cart
trigger_build: false
remove_tag: false

name: CONFIGURE A DNS WILDCARD
extra_vars:
---
dns_key_name: example.key
dns_server_ip: '{{ dns_server }}'
dns_zone: ocp.example.com
user_data_file: /etc/named/example.key.
a_record: '*.apps'

name: Configure Bind Server
extra_vars:
---
master_server_ip: "{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address }}"
zone_network: "{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address.split('.')[0:3] | join('.') }}"
zone_ip: "{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address }}"
bind_forwarders: [1.1.1.1,8.8.8.8]

name: Configure Chrony
extra_vars:
chrony_config_server:
  - 0.rhel.pool.ntp.org
  - 1.rhel.pool.ntp.org

name: Configure DNS server for OpenShift
extra_vars:
key_name: example.key
server_ip: ansible_tower_ip
zone_name: ocp.example.com

name: Configure Tower For OpenShift Deployments
extra_vars:
---
#repo_url: https://gitlab.consulting.redhat.com/rto/ansible-tower-configs.git
branch: master
ansible_tower_config: ansible-tower-configuration-v0.0.9.json
awxinventorypath: "minimal/inventory"
awxinventoryname: "OSE_3.11"

spec.question_description: This will be used to configure the newly deployed tower instance.

description: Creates a new project in the remote sites
extra_vars:
---
application_name: coolstore
lifecycle: dev
name: Create Deployment

description: Creates a new project in the remote sites
extra_vars:
---
application_name: coolstore
lifecycle: dev
name: Create Project
Deploy Ansible Tower
extra_vars:
#https://docs.ansible.com/ansible-tower/latest/html/release-notes/relnotes.html
---
tower_setup_version: "3.3.3-1"
tower_setup_dir: "/opt"
tower_setup_admin_password: "admin"
tower_setup_pg_database: "tower"
tower_setup_pg_password: "tower"
tower_setup_rabbitmq_pass: "tower"

spec.question_description: BROKER SUPPORT FOR AUTHENTICATED REGISTRIES
BROKER SUPPORT FOR AUTHENTICATED REGISTRIES PASSWORD

name: Deploy  Virtual Machine on VMWARE
extra_vars:
diskcount: 1
vm_core_per_cpu: 1
vm_cpu_count: 1
vmware_datacenter: Default-DataCenter
vmware_datastore: DefaultCluster
vmware_disk_size: 20
vmware_folder: /
vmware_network: VM Network
vmware_new_hostname: '{{ server_name }}'
vmware_ram_mb: 2048
vmware_state: poweredon
vmware_template_name: '{{ vm_template_name }}'

name: DNS port Verification
extra_vars:
---
port_num: 53
default_timeout: 10

name: dns server workflow update A record
OpenShift 3.11 control plane upgrade
extra_vars:
---
# OpenShift Version
openshift_pkg_version: -3.11.141
openshift_image_tag: v3.11.141
#Control how many node hosts are upgraded at the same time.
openshift_upgrade_nodes_serial: 1
# Specify how many nodes can fail in each batch of upgrades.
openshift_upgrade_nodes_max_fail_percentage: "25%"

name: OpenShift Nodes Upgrade
extra_vars:
---
# OpenShift Version
openshift_pkg_version: -3.11.141
openshift_image_tag: v3.11.141
#Control how many node hosts are upgraded at the same time.
openshift_upgrade_nodes_serial: 1
# Specify how many nodes can fail in each batch of upgrades.
openshift_upgrade_nodes_max_fail_percentage: "25%"

name: OpenShift Preinstallation Checks
extra_vars:
---
node_names:
 - master
 - node1
 - node2
 - node3
 - node4
fqdn: ocp.example.com
remote_registry: registry.redhat.io

extra_vars:
---
# time in seconds
timout_val: 30

cleanup_images: false

cart
catalog
coolstore-gw
inventory
pricing
rating
review
web-ui

cart
catalog
coolstore-gw
hystrix-dashboard:1.0.27
inventory
pricing
rating
review
turbine-server:1.0.27
web-ui

extra_vars:

image: cart
tag_from: latest
tag_to: dev

extra_vars:
---

name: update A record for OpenShift node

---

dns_server_ip: '{{ dns_server }}'

name: Validate DNS Server Entry
extra_vars:
---
a_record: test
dns_key_name: example.key
dns_server_ip: '{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address }}'
dns_zone: ocp.example.com
ip_address: use_dummy_ip_to_test_a_record
user_data_file: /etc/named/example.key

name: Wipe vmware vm
extra_vars:
---
vcenter_cluster: null
vcenter_datacenter: vsphere.example.com
